issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I tried to build the appx of my windows app by means the command :
appc run -p windows -T dist-phonestore -O <output directory>
but doesn't work. 
It returns : "You cannot perform this operation with your current plan.  Please upgrade to build your application for production distribution."

I'm using the free license.

Can be necessary use some paid licences to solve the problem? and if the response is yes, which?


I also tried to use the command Ti build -p windows -T dist-phonestore -O <output_directory> to build the appx. This time i'm able to create it, but it is not accepted by the windows phone store, because the value of the ti.windows.publishername inside the tiapp.xml is not wrote in the manifest inside the appx.
Obviously in both the cases i modified the tiapp.xml file with all the features needed for the windows store: publisher id, app name, etc..


Thanks
fields.summary: Unable to publish a windows phone app on the windows phone store
fields.environment:
O.S WIndows 10
Titanium SDK 5.2.2 GA
Titanium CLI 5.0.7
Windows SDK 8.1

comments.body:
Hello, 

As a free user youâ€™ll have full access to the Platform but you can not publish your app to windows phone store. You need to have a paid plan only when you decide to take your first app live. Here is the link to our packages. You can upgrade your package by https://billing.appcelerator.com/billing in dashboard.

Regards,
Sharif.

Hello, 

Please choose one of our paid plan from here http://www.appcelerator.com/pricing/. For module development, you will be needing PRO plan. Please update your plan by https://billing.appcelerator.com/billing in dashboard. 

Thanks for choosing Appcelerator as your developing platform.

Regards,
Sharif.
